column5: Told my son tonight he should become a rocket scientist, at the very least if the space program cuts back he can install home electronics....HDMI this that optical this that gren blue wires, poopte where did the days go when all you needed to do was connect a few things and off you went.  My rant!!
Yeah...  The instruction manual is just the manufacturers "Opinion"...

OK.  For the record,  I AM a rocket scientist, or manage them and take the credit.  Most consumer electronics are designed to make it hard to hook them up, even with the book of words alongside to hlep.  You also gotta know that my daughter and her bf regularly rearrange the TV/DVD/VCR/TVR combo.  And it takes me all day to figger it out one more time.
That's very disappointing to hear douG... > > > > > >I didn't know your daughter had a boyfriend?
A clough for a big screen tv sounds like a good deal to me. Keep at it, im sure youll get it sooner or later.
